meaningMnemonic: If someone <kanji>overthrow</kanji>s your <kanji>property</kanji>, it'll end in <vocabulary>bankruptcy</vocabulary>. Without property you're sure to <vocabulary>go bankrupt</vocabulary>, unfortunately.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
